required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pre-Mix Insulin Lispro Treatment for Type 2 Diabetes Patients Who Consume a Light Breakfast
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Premixed Insulin Lispro Low-Mixture and Mid-Mixture Regimens With Separate Basal and Bolus Insulin Injections in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes With Inadequate Glycemic Control on Oral Therapy Who Consume Light Breakfast

brief_summary.textblock: This study is designed to look at how best to start and then gradually intensify (as needed) the insulin lispro premix regimen in type 2 diabetes patients who consume a light breakfast.

primary_outcome.measure: Baseline Adjusted Glycosylated Hemoglobin (HbA1c) at Endpoint
primary_outcome.description: Least Squares Mean (LSMean) values were adjusted based on a fixed effect linear regression model: HbA1c = Treatment + Country + HbA1c baseline value + Ramadan holiday between Visit 10 (Week 36) and Visit 12 (Week 48) (yes/no) in per-protocol (PP) population.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Using Each Possible Final Insulin Regimen
secondary_outcome.description: Insulin Regimens: Lispro: Mid-Mix (MM) before noon; Low-Mix (LM) before evening (PM); MM before noon+LM before PM; LM before morning (AM)+MM before noon + LM before PM; MM before AM +MM before noon+LM before PM Glargine: Glargine once a day (QD); Glargine QD + 1 Lispro (noon or PM); Glargine QD + 2 Lispro (noon and PM); Glargine QD + 3 Lispro.

Least Squares Mean (LSMean) values were adjusted based on a mixed effect linear regression model with a participant specific random effect: HbA1c = Treatment + Country + HbA1c baseline value + Ramadan holiday between Visit 10 (Week 36) and Visit 12 (Week 48) (yes/no) + visit + visit*treatment in Full Analysis Set (FAS) Population.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Patients Achieving HbA1c Less Than or Equal to 6.5% and Less Than or Equal to 7% Over Time

secondary_outcome.description: Mean postprandial blood glucose values were assessed using GlycoMark, which is an FDA-approved blood test measuring levels of 1,5 anhydroglucitol (1,5 AG) in serum or plasma. When 1,5 AG values decrease, serum glucose levels increase.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Daily Total, Basal and Prandial Insulin Dose
Body Weight Change From Baseline to Endpoint
Incidence of All Self-reported Hypoglycemic Episodes
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants with self-reported hypoglycemic episodes at any time during the study. A hypoglycemic episode is defined as any time a participant feels that he/she is experiencing a sign or symptom that is associated with hypoglycemia, or has a blood glucose level of ≤70 mg/dL (3.9 mmol/L) (Roche plasma glucose) or ≤75 mg/dL (4.2 mmol/L) (IFCC Plasma Values), even if it was not associated with signs, symptoms, or treatment consistent with current guidelines (ADA 2005).

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate Per 30 Days of All Self-reported Hypoglycemic Episodes
secondary_outcome.description: The hypoglycemia rate between two visits will be calculated as the total number of episodes between the two visits divided by the number of days between the visits, and then multiplied by 30 days (rate per patient per 30 days).

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events
secondary_outcome.description: A summary of serious adverse events (SAEs) and all other non-serious treatment-emergent adverse events (TEAE) is located in the Reported Adverse Event Module. TEAEs are defined as events that are newly reported after randomization or reported to worsen in severity from baseline.

arm_group.description: Glargine +/- 1,2 or 3 injections of insulin lispro plus oral antihyperglycemic medications (OAMs)
Premixed Insulin Lispro (mid-mixture or low-mixture) 1,2 or 3 injections plus OAMs

intervention.description: patient glucose-level dependent, injection, as needed per patient glucose level, 48 weeks
patient glucose level dependent, injection, as needed per patient glucose level, 48 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diabetes Mellitus, Type 2
- have been receiving metformin plus at least one other oral antihyperglycemic medication (OAM) (sulfonylurea or Thiazolidinedione [TZD]) without insulin, for at least 90 days prior to Visit 1
- glycosylated hemoglobin (HbA1c) greater than or equal to 7.0% and less than 11.0%
- regularly consume a light breakfast (less than 15% of total daily calorie intake)
- capable and willing to follow the protocol
- give written consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- are taking a TZD whose country label does not allow in combination with insulin
- are taking any glucose-lowering agents (other than specified in the inclusion criteria above)
- have a body mass index greater than 40 kg/m^2
- have a history of severe hypoglycemia in past 24 weeks
- are pregnant or may become pregnant
- women who are breastfeeding
- have significant cardiac disease
- have significant renal or liver disease
- undergoing therapy for a malignancy
- contraindications to study medications
- have an irregular sleep/wake cycle

outcome.title: Baseline Adjusted Glycosylated Hemoglobin (HbA1c) at Endpoint
outcome.description: Least Squares Mean (LSMean) values were adjusted based on a fixed effect linear regression model: HbA1c = Treatment + Country + HbA1c baseline value + Ramadan holiday between Visit 10 (Week 36) and Visit 12 (Week 48) (yes/no) in per-protocol (PP) population.
outcome.population: PP Population=All participants who were randomized and met following criteria during study: no violations of Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria no early study discontinuation compliant with treatment received no other antihyperglycemic medication than allowed in Protocol, and have not been on systemic glucocorticoids for >14 consecutive days.

analysis.non_inferiority_desc: Noninferiority margin is defined as 0.4%. If the upper 95%CI for difference in LSMeans is below 0.4% then MIX arm will be declared noninferior to GLAR arm
analysis.estimate_desc: Least squares mean difference = (Premix insulin Lispro -Glargine)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
